job_details.Functieomschrijving:
To achieve this mission, we are looking for a Senior Backend Developer to join our Generative AI team.
            What you will do
            You'll be working in CM.com's Generative AI team. In our Generative AI team, you'll be working on providing a state-of-the-art centralized platform around generative AI to CM.com customers where they can manage and control their generative AI powered assistants. Our Generative AI team focusses on providing functionality and control around Large Language Models in combination with traditional NLP concepts to fully service our customers' use-cases.
            As a Back-End Engineer, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the scalability and reliability of our existing platform while collaborating closely with the team to design and implement cutting-edge solutions. You will integrate AI capabilities developed by our data scientists and ML engineers with traditional software engineering practices to build innovative products that are either customer-facing or integrated across the broader CM.com platform and product portfolio.
            The core product currently consists of:
            · A custom-built CMS customers can use to easily manage the data in their knowledge base, synchronize their knowledge base with external systems while also preparing the data for our inference engine.
            · A custom-built inference engine that's able to process any question/instruction from the end-user providing fully customizable, autonomous AI agents across multiple domains (customer service, marketing, internal automation…).
job_details.full_text:
Backend Developer

To achieve this mission, we are looking for a Senior Backend Developer to join our Generative AI team.
            What you will do
            You'll be working in CM.com's Generative AI team. In our Generative AI team, you'll be working on providing a state-of-the-art centralized platform around generative AI to CM.com customers where they can manage and control their generative AI powered assistants. Our Generative AI team focusses on providing functionality and control around Large Language Models in combination with traditional NLP concepts to fully service our customers' use-cases.
            As a Back-End Engineer, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the scalability and reliability of our existing platform while collaborating closely with the team to design and implement cutting-edge solutions. You will integrate AI capabilities developed by our data scientists and ML engineers with traditional software engineering practices to build innovative products that are either customer-facing or integrated across the broader CM.com platform and product portfolio.
            The core product currently consists of:
            · A custom-built CMS customers can use to easily manage the data in their knowledge base, synchronize their knowledge base with external systems while also preparing the data for our inference engine.
            · A custom-built inference engine that's able to process any question/instruction from the end-user providing fully customizable, autonomous AI agents across multiple domains (customer service, marketing, internal automation…).

profile_classification.rationale: The role focuses on building and maintaining a platform around generative AI, specifically Large Language Models, and integrating AI capabilities into customer-facing products. This aligns strongly with the definition and responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, emphasizing LLMs, RAG, and application development.

phrases: ensuring the scalability and reliability of our existing platform
integrate AI capabilities developed by our data scientists and ML engineers with traditional software engineering practices
build innovative products that are either customer-facing or integrated across the broader CM.com platform and product portfolio
process any question/instruction from the end-user
job_tasks.justification: The job description heavily emphasizes backend development, building scalable and reliable platforms, integrating AI capabilities into applications, and developing customer-facing products and core components like CMS and inference engines. This directly maps to traditional software engineering practices needed to support AI systems.

The role is situated within a Generative AI team and explicitly mentions working with Large Language Models, NLP concepts, and building an inference engine for AI agents. This indicates direct involvement in the application and utilization of generative AI models.

phrases: ensuring the scalability and reliability of our existing platform
manage and control their generative AI powered assistants
preparing the data for our inference engine
job_tasks.justification: The focus on ensuring scalability and reliability of the platform, managing AI assistants, and preparing data for the inference engine implies operational aspects of deploying and maintaining AI systems in production.

phrases: providing a state-of-the-art centralized platform around generative AI to CM.com customers
job_tasks.justification: The role aims to provide a platform for customers to manage AI assistants and service various customer use-cases (customer service, marketing, automation), indicating a need to understand business needs and translate them into technical solutions.

mentions: ensuring the scalability and reliability of our existing platform
